```{r}
# Load libs
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

# load data
acoustic_detections <- read.csv("CC-202311.csv")
# Filter the dataframe to include only observations where the column "ev" equals "SIT"
filtered_data <- subset(acoustic_detections, ev == "SIT")
filtered_data <- subset(filtered_data, X1 == "CETA")
# Drop the column "EID" from the filtered dataframe
filtered_data <- subset(filtered_data, select = -EID)
```
